title: Emmerdale spoilers: Faith exposes Moira's affair to Cain?
text:
For several months now, Moira Dingle (Natalie J Robb) has been engaging in a steamy affair with farmhand Nate Robinson (Jurrell Carter) in Emmerdale, but could the truth be set to out in the coming episodes courtesy of Faith Dingle (Sally Dexter), as the matriarch begins to snoop on her daughter-in-law?

Desperate for Moira and Cain (Jeff Hordley) to spend some time together, Faith takes it upon herself to maker a romantic lunch for the pair. However, Nate scuppers her plans, as it turns out he has plans of his own, as he takes Moira out to a country pub for lunch.

Upon realising that his mum has been meddling once more, Cain berates her for sticking her nose in where it’s not wanted, but Faith persists in calling Moira’s mobile. When Moira realises that she’s missed several calls from her mother-in-law, she ultimately decides to cut her lunch with Nate short and thus heads back to the farm.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Faith continues meddling in Moira’s affairs — ahem, so to speak — as, later in the café, she watches her share a secret conversation with Pete (Anthony Quinlan) and thus jumps to the wrong conclusion. The following day, she quizzes Pete about why exactly he’s moved into the B&B.

Knowing what Faith’s trying to get at, Pete succeeds in keeping shtum about Moira’s affair, but he later informs his boss that Faith is on to her — much to Moira’s dismay. What’s more, Pete reveals that he’s not going to cover for her and Nate anymore, leaving Moira incredibly unnerved.

Will Faith discover what Moira’s been up to?

The Dingle matriarch has proven how good she is at meddling in other people’s business in the past, so with her on the case it could be only a matter of time before Moira’s affair with Nate becomes public knowledge.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Faith's meddling becomes a thorn in Moira's side.
